item.title: Design Tips
item.author: reid@reactific.com (Reid Spencer)
item.description: Domain Hierarchy When considering how to organize your specification into a set , there are no formal rules. Domains are fuzzy concepts on purpose. However, here are a few things that might help: Domain, Subdomain, Bounded Context, Problem/Solution Space in DDD: Clearly Defined Domain Drive Design: Domain Definition Use the communication structure of the organization per Conway’s Law Use the Event Storming process, and then look for the event groupings.
